components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We continue investigating an issue with TaskRouter. A subset of Tasks are failing to cancel when the Task timeout is reached. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with TaskRouter. A subset of Tasks are failing to cancel when the Task timeout is reached. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with TaskRouter. A subset of Tasks are failing to cancel when the Task timeout is reached. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with TaksRouter. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A third party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Customers are able to submit their Campaign requests. However, reviews are expected to take longer. Twilio continues to escalate the situation and work with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide updates as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update on 03/03/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update every 7 days. Next update will be provided on 02/24/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with A2P 10DLC campaign reviews, facing delays due to high volume. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have additional information.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in Thailand is conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 March 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 24 March 2023 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call  disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio Thailand Phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - U.S. Cellular

incident_updates.body: The U.S. Cellular network in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 March 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 25 March 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from U.S. Cellular handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the Brazil is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 March 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 25 March 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Brazil networks handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting an planned maintenance from 27 March 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 27 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting an planned maintenance from 27 March 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 27 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yota Russia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 27 March 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 27 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in Romania is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 March 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 27 March 2023 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent disconnections and call failures to and from Romania phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 March 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 27 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in UK and India is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 March 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 28 March 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of UK and India phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carriers Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of Small US networks in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 28 March 2023 at 02:00 PDT until 28 March 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and Austria is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 28 March 2023 at 17:15 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Germany and Austria phone numbers.

The AT&T network in US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 28 March 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 29 March 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
05 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 05 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT

26 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance from 05 April 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 06 April2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting planned maintenance from 05 April 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 06 April2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

incident_updates.body: The LMT GSM network in Latvia is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 April 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 30 April 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from LMT GSM handsets.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance beginning 20 March 2023 at 03:00 PDT until 25 March 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, WhatsApp senders may each experience downtimes of up to 15 minutes, which can result in delayed deliveries for WhatsApp messages sent to/from these senders during this brief period.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
